ing: 1 (3 ounce) package instant pistachio pudding mix
1 (8 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed
des: "This recipe is super simple and can be changed to suit your tastes.  Just add additional fruit and/or nuts."
ins: In a large bowl, combine the pineapple and dry pistachio pudding mix. Fold in thawed whipped topping and marshmallows until well mixed. Refrigerate until chilled and serve.
